mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tmp_upload_file ( user_id, session_id, unique_id, file_type, file_extension, file_content_type, file_data, file_base64, created_at ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{sessionId}, #{uniqueId}, #{fileType}, #{fileExtension}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileData}, #{fileBase64}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, session_id AS sessionId, unique_id AS uniqueId, file_type AS fileType, file_extension AS fileExtension, file_content_type AS fileContentType, file_base64 AS fileBase64, created_at AS createdAt FROM tmp_upload_file WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND session_id = #{sessionId} AND unique_id = #{uniqueId} AND file_type = #{fileType}
